function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate building design for occupant health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of occupant-centric building operation modules","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient influence of facility managers on building health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding about the effects of buildings attributes on occupant health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective collaboration between project stakeholders","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of interest from employers and building owners","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reluctance to share personal data is a significant challenge for achieving the design and operation of buildings that support and promote occupant health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in defining quantitative metrics for occupant health in buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity in the type of data that should be collected","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty of linking building-related data to occupant health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive measurement of economic value of health in buildings","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disparities in health conditions based on income and race","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for occupant health in building design","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited emphasis on designing, constructing, and operating buildings with occupant health and well-being as an objective","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resistance to the healthy building movement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scarcity of real-world cases and lack of confidence in healthy building initiatives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased focus on occupant health in building design and operation due to recent pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data-related challenges for achieving design and operation of healthy buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on building professionals’ perspective regarding buildings’ impact on occupant health.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Generalizing results from a sample dominated by engineers, architects, and facility managers","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemic bias effect on questionnaire responses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential lag in academic publications compared to current trends","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased focus on physical and mental well-being in building occupant health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on questionnaires as the primary method for studying and measuring occupant health may lead to incomplete or biased data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Major focus on office buildings in research studies and practice-based efforts may neglect other types of buildings that also impact occupant health.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of interdisciplinary collaboration in promoting occupant health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to consider the trade-off and synergies between energy efficiency, sustainability, and occupant health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"No disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of clear and commonly accepted definition of ’healthy building’","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited systematic process to incorporate who’s definitions of health in buildings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in building design to adapt to changes without compromising occupant well-being","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global epidemics of stress and longer working hours may impact occupant mental and social well-being in buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to natural views contributing to job stress in office workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of outdoor access and green spaces leading to poor mental and physical health.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of widely accepted occupant health assessment standard","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complicated and coupled factors affecting occupant health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Commercial off-the-shelf sensors for ieq parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through contact with shared biomarker measurement devices , thermal cameras, sensors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of increased infection through contact with commonly touched surfaces during occupant health assessments , survey instruments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of discussion and consideration of contagious disease transmission risk in the literature on occupant health assessment tools","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Building guidelines may not prioritize occupant health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited adoption of health-focused building standards","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low certification numbers for health-focused building standards","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues for building occupants","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate thermal comfort causing discomfort and reduced productivity for occupants","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
